General.Name: BP PLC ADR
General.Description: BP p.l.c., an integrated energy company, provides carbon products and services. The company operates through Gas & Low Carbon Energy, Oil Production & Operations, and Customers & Products segments. It engages in the production of natural gas and integrated gas and power; gas trading; operation of solar and onshore and offshore wind power, as well as hydrogen and carbon capture, power trading, and storage facilities; trading and marketing of renewable and non-renewable power; and production of crude oil. The company is also involved in convenience and retail fuel, EV charging, Castrol lubricant, aviation, B2B, and midstream businesses; refining and oil trading; and bioenergy business. BP p.l.c. was founded in 1908 and is headquartered in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 1 St James's Square, London, United Kingdom, SW1Y 4PD
